name: src/consent-string.js
consentLanguageRegexp
description: Regular expression for validating

name: constructor
description: Initialize a new ConsentString object

params.name: baseString
params.description: An existing consent string to parse and use for our initial values

name: version
description: Version number of consent string specification

name: vendorList
description: Vendor list

name: vendorListVersion
description: Version of the vendor list used for the purposes and vendors

name: cmpId
description: The unique ID of the CMP that last modified the consent string

name: cmpVersion
description: Version of the code used by the CMP when collecting consent

name: consentScreen
description: ID of the screen used by CMP when collecting consent

name: consentLanguage
description: Language that the CMP asked consent in

name: allowedPurposeIds
description: List of purpose IDs that the user has given consent to

name: allowedVendorIds
description: List of vendor IDs that the user has given consent to

name: getConsentString
description: Get the web-safe, base64-encoded consent string

name: getVersion
description: Get the version number that this consent string specification adheres to

return.description: Version number of consent string specification

name: getVendorListVersion
description: Get the version of the vendor list

name: setGlobalVendorList
description:
Set the vendors list to use when generating the consent string

The expected format is the one from https://github.com/InteractiveAdvertisingBureau/GDPR-Transparency-and-Consent-Framework/blob/master/Draft_for_Public_Comment_Transparency%20%26%20Consent%20Framework%20-%20cookie%20and%20vendor%20list%20format%20specification%20v1.0a.pdf

name: setCmpId
description:
Set the ID of the Consent Management Platform that last modified the consent string

Every CMP is assigned a unique ID by the IAB EU that must be provided here before changing any other value in the consent string.

name: getCmpId
description: Get the ID of the Consent Management Platform from the consent string

name: setCmpVersion
description:
Set the version of the Consent Management Platform that last modified the consent string

This version number references the CMP code running when collecting the user consent.

name: getCmpVersion
description: Get the verison of the Consent Management Platform that last modified the consent string

name: setConsentScreen
description:
Set the Consent Management Platform screen ID that collected the user consent

This screen ID references a unique view in the CMP that was displayed to the user to collect consent

name: getConsentScreen
description: Get the Consent Management Platform screen ID that collected the user consent

name: setConsentLanguage
description: Set the language that the CMP asked the consent in

params.name: language
params.description: Two-letter ISO639-1 code (en, fr, de, etc.)

name: getConsentLanguage
description: Get the language that the CMP asked consent in

return.description: Two-letter ISO639-1 code (en, fr, de, etc.)

name: setPurposesAllowed
description: Set the list of purpose IDs that the user has given consent to

params.name: purposeIds
params.description: An array of integers that map to the purposes defined in the vendor list. Purposes included in the array are purposes that the user has given consent to

name: getPurposesAllowed
description: Get the list of purpose IDs that the user has given consent to

name: setPurposeAllowed
description: Set the consent status of a user for a given purpose

params.name: purposeId
params.description: The ID (from the vendor list) of the purpose to update

name: isPurposeAllowed
description: Check if the user has given consent for a specific purpose

name: setVendorsAllowed
description: Set the list of vendor IDs that the user has given consent to

params.name: vendorIds
params.description: An array of integers that map to the vendors defined in the vendor list. Vendors included in the array are vendors that the user has given consent to

name: getVendorsAllowed
description: Get the list of vendor IDs that the user has given consent to

name: setVendorAllowed
description: Set the consent status of a user for a given vendor

params.name: vendorId
params.description: The ID (from the vendor list) of the vendor to update

name: isVendorAllowed
description: Check if the user has given consent for a specific vendor

name: src/decode.js
decodeConsentString
description: Decode consent data from a web-safe base64-encoded string

name: src/encode.js
encodeVendorIdsToBits
description: Encode a list of vendor IDs into bits

params.name: maxVendorId
params.description: Highest vendor ID in the vendor list

params.name: allowedVendorIds
params.description: Vendors that the user has given consent to

name: encodePurposeIdsToBits
description: Encode a list of purpose IDs into bits

params.name: purposes
params.description: List of purposes from the vendor list

params.name: allowedPurposeIds
params.description: List of purpose IDs that the user has given consent to

name: convertVendorsToRanges
description: Convert a list of vendor IDs to ranges

params.name: vendors
params.description: List of vendors from the vendor list

params.name: allowedVendorIds
params.description: List of vendor IDs that the user has given consent to

name: encodeConsentString
description: Encode consent data into a web-safe base64-encoded string

params.name: consentData
params.description: Data to include in the string (see `utils/definitions.js` for the list of fields)

name: src/index.js
src/utils/bits.js
encodeDataToBits
description:
Encode the data properties to a bit string. Encoding will encode
either `selectedVendorIds` or the `vendorRangeList` depending on
the value of the `isRange` flag.

name: encodeToBase64
description: Take all fields required to encode the consent string and produce the URL safe Base64 encoded value

name: decodeFromBase64
description: Decode the (URL safe Base64) value of a consent string into an object.

name: src/utils/definitions.js
vendorVersionMap
description:
Definition of the consent string encoded format

From https://github.com/InteractiveAdvertisingBureau/GDPR-Transparency-and-Consent-Framework/blob/master/Draft_for_Public_Comment_Transparency%20%26%20Consent%20Framework%20-%20cookie%20and%20vendor%20list%20format%20specification%20v1.0a.pdf

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "consent-string",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Encode and decode web-safe base64 consent information with the IAB EU's GDPR Transparency and Consent Framework",
  "homepage": "http://advertisingconsent.eu/",
  "keywords": [
    "consent",
    "gdpr",
    "iab"
  ],
  "license": "MIT",
  "files": [
    "dist/"
  ],
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "types": "dist/index.d.ts",
  "directories": {
    "lib": "src",
    "test": "test"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "mocha test/ --recursive",
    "coverage": "nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text-summary --reporter=lcov --check-coverage --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 mocha test/ --recursive",
    "lint": "eslint src/. test/.",
    "docs": "esdoc",
    "build": "babel src --out-dir dist",
    "release": "npm run build && npm publish --access public"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "base-64": "^0.1.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "chai": "^4.0.2",
    "coveralls": "^3.0.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.0.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^11.2.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.3.0",
    "eslint-plugin-mocha": "^4.11.0",
    "mocha": "^3.4.2",
    "nyc": "^11.0.2",
    "sinon": "^4.5.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
